verses.verse: <S%G3767>Now<s%> when <S%G5347>Festus<s%> was <S%G1910>come<s%> into the <S%G1885>province,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> he <S%G305>ascended<s%> from <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> and the <S%G4413>chief<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1718>informed<s%> him <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and <S%G3870>sought<s%> him,

And <S%G154>desired<s%> <S%G5485>favor<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> him, that he would <S%G3343>send<s%> for him to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G4160>laying<s%> <S%G4160>wait<s%> <S%G1747><s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> to <S%G337>kill<s%> him.

But <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> that <S%G3972>Paul<s%> should be <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> and that he <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G1607>depart<s%> <S%G1722>shortly<s%> <S%G5034><s%> thither.

Let them <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> he, which <S%G1722>among<s%> you are <S%G1415>able,<s%> <S%G4782>go<s%> <S%G4782>down<s%> with me, and <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>this<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G824>wickedness<s%> in him.

And when he had <S%G1304>tarried<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> he <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G2542>Caesarea;<s%> and the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> <S%G2523>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to be <S%G71>brought.<s%>

And when he was <S%G3854>come,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> which <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G4026>stood<s%> <S%G4026>round<s%> <S%G3936>about,<s%> and <S%G5342>laid<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> and <S%G926>grievous<s%> <S%G157>complaints<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> they <S%G2480>could<s%> not <S%G584>prove.<s%>

While he <S%G626>answered<s%> for himself, <S%G3777>Neither<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> yet <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> have I <S%G264>offended<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing at all.

But <S%G5347>Festus,<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G2698>do<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> a <S%G5485>pleasure,<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> Will you <S%G305>go<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> be <S%G2919>judged<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things <S%G1909>before<s%> me?

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> I <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar's<s%> <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> I <S%G1163>ought<s%> to be <S%G2919>judged:<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have I <S%G91>done<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G91>wrong,<s%> as you <S%G2566>very<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G1921>know.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> I be an <S%G91>offender,<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> have <S%G4238>committed<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> I <S%G3868>refuse<s%> not to <S%G599>die:<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G3762>none<s%> of these things <S%G3739>whereof<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2723>accuse<s%> me, <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G5483>deliver<s%> me to them. I <S%G1941>appeal<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5347>Festus,<s%> when he had <S%G4814>conferred<s%> with the <S%G4824>council,<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> Have you <S%G1941>appealed<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar?<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> shall you <S%G4198>go.<s%>

And <S%G1230>after<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> and <S%G959>Bernice<s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> to <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> to <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5347>Festus.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G1304>been<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G394>declared<s%> <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G3588>cause<s%> <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> There is a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2641>left<s%> in <S%G1198>bonds<s%> by <S%G5344>Felix:<s%>

<S%G4012>About<s%> <S%G3739>whom,<s%> when I was <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1718>informed<s%> me, <S%G154>desiring<s%> to have <S%G1349>judgment<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> him.

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G611>answered,<s%> It is not the <S%G1485>manner<s%> of the <S%G4514>Romans<s%> to <S%G5483>deliver<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G684>die,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> that he which is <S%G2723>accused<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> to <S%G4383>face,<s%> and <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G5117>license<s%> to <S%G627>answer<s%> for himself <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G1462>crime<s%> <S%G1462>laid<s%> against him.

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> when they were <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G1759>here,<s%> <S%G3367>without<s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3362>any<s%> <S%G311>delay<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1836>morrow<s%> I <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat,<s%> and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G435>man<s%> to be <S%G71>brought<s%> forth.

<S%G4012>Against<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> when the <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> up, they <S%G2018>brought<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G156>accusation<s%> of such things as I <S%G5282>supposed:<s%>

But <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> him of their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1175>superstition,<s%> and of <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> which was <S%G2348>dead,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5335>affirmed<s%> to be <S%G2198>alive.<s%>

And because I <S%G639>doubted<s%> of such <S%G4012>manner<s%> of <S%G2214>questions,<s%> I <S%G3004>asked<s%> him <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> be <S%G2919>judged<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> matters.

But when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G1941>appealed<s%> to be <S%G5083>reserved<s%> to the <S%G1233>hearing<s%> of <S%G828>Augustus,<s%> I <S%G2753>commanded<s%> him to be <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> I might <S%G3992>send<s%> him to <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to <S%G5347>Festus,<s%> I would <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> myself. To <S%G839>morrow,<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> he, you shall <S%G191>hear<s%> him.

And on the <S%G1887>morrow,<s%> when <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> was <S%G2064>come,<s%> and <S%G959>Bernice,<s%> with <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G5325>pomp,<s%> and was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G201>place<s%> of <S%G201>hearing,<s%> with the <S%G5506>chief<s%> <S%G5506>captains,<s%> and <S%G3588>principal<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1851><s%> <S%G5607><s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> at <S%G5347>Festus'<s%> <S%G2753>commandment<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G71>brought<s%> forth.

And <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G4840>here<s%> <S%G4840>present<s%> with us, you <S%G2334>see<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man, <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G1793>dealt<s%> with me, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and also <S%G1759>here,<s%> <S%G1916>crying<s%> that he <S%G1163>ought<s%> not to <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G3371>any<s%> <S%G3371>longer.<s%>

But when I <S%G2638>found<s%> that he had <S%G4238>committed<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> and that he <S%G848>himself<s%> has <S%G1941>appealed<s%> to <S%G828>Augustus,<s%> I <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G2919>determined<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> him.

Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G804>certain<s%> thing to <S%G1125>write<s%> to my <S%G2962>lord.<s%> <S%G1352>Why<s%> I have <S%G4254>brought<s%> him <S%G4254>forth<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> you, and <S%G3122>specially<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> you, O <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> that, after <S%G351>examination<s%> <S%G1096>had,<s%> I might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> to <S%G1125>write.<s%>
For it <S%G1380>seems<s%> to me <S%G249>unreasonable<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner,<s%> and not with to <S%G4591>signify<s%> the <S%G156>crimes<s%> laid <S%G2596>against<s%> him.
